Package view

Class ExecuteCommandView

java.lang.Object
view.ExecuteCommandView
public class ExecuteCommandView
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to execute entered command i.e.: call respective functions from controller that will process the command.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ExecuteCommandView()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void editContinent​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String[] p_commandParameters)
    The function calls the editContinent method with relevant parameter list.
    void editCountry​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String[] p_commandParameters)
    This function calls the editContinent method with relevant parameter list.
    void editNeighbor​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String[] p_commandParameters)
    Calls the editNeighbor method in mapController to add new neighbors or remove neighbors.
    boolean loadMapFile​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String p_filename)
    This function is used to load a valid map file (if present) and pass the content to controller for processing and creation of relevant objects

    This function is used to read a map file and pass the content to controller for processing and creation of relevant objects

  • Method Details

    • readMapFile

      public boolean readMapFile​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String p_filename)
      This function is used to read a map file and pass the content to controller for processing and creation of relevant objects
      Parameters:
      p_filename - The map file to be read
      p_gameEngineObject - Data read from map will be added to the p_gameEngineObject
      Returns:
      It return true if map is loaded else false

    • loadMapFile

      public boolean loadMapFile​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String p_filename)
      This function is used to load a valid map file (if present) and pass the content to controller for processing and creation of relevant objects
      Parameters:
      p_filename - The map file to be read
      p_gameEngineObject - Data read from map will be added to the p_gameEngineObject
      Returns:
      It return true if map is loaded else false

    • editContinent

      public void editContinent​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String[] p_commandParameters)
      The function calls the editContinent method with relevant parameter list.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineObject - The edits will be made to this object.
      p_commandParameters - The list of validated sub commands to performs relevant edits.

    • editCountry

      public void editCountry​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String[] p_commandParameters)
      This function calls the editContinent method with relevant parameter list.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineObject - The edits will be made to this object.
      p_commandParameters - The list of validated sub commands to performs relevant edits.

    • showMap

      public void showMap​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject)
      Calls the showMap method in the mapController to display the map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineObject - GameEngine object that holds the map data.

    • validateMap

      public void validateMap​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject)
      Calls the validateMap method in the mapController to check if the map is valid.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineObject - GameEngine object that holds the map data.

    • saveMap

      public boolean saveMap​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String fileName)
      Save the map to the file described by the filename.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineObject - GameEngine object that holds the map data.
      fileName - Location where the map will be saved.
      Returns:
      true if map was saved successful else returns false

    • editNeighbor

      public void editNeighbor​(GameEngine p_gameEngineObject, java.lang.String[] p_commandParameters)
      Calls the editNeighbor method in mapController to add new neighbors or remove neighbors.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineObject - GameEngine object that holds the map data.
      p_commandParameters - The list of validated sub commands to performs relevant edits.
